titles.title: Future Card Buddyfight DDD
フューチャーカード バディファイトDDD
未来卡搭档对战DDD

anime.description: It is the year 2030, and the stage is the capital of Japan, Chou-Tokyo. Through "Buddyfight", humans have started cultural interactions with residents from other worlds called "Affinity Dimensions". Buddyfight is a game with selected humans as the "Buddyfighter", and residents from the other world as the partner (known as "Buddy Monster"). These battles have high significance and sometimes it is even used to decide the fate of a nation, and naturally there are those who seek to use the Buddy Monsters for evil purposes. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

episode.title: カッケェ! ジャックの必殺モンスター!!
Cool! Jack`s Impact Monster!
Kakkee! Jack no Hissatsu Monster!!
episode.summary: Bal is given special permission to attend classes. A jealous student tries to get him in trouble by framing him for a crime. Jack and Tasuku work together to clear Bal`s name... by challenging the villain to a Buddyfight! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コワァ! ガイトの必殺モンスター!!
Scary! Gaito`s Impact Monster!
Kowaa! Gaito no Hissatsu Monster!!
episode.summary: When Gao forgets an important promise, Bal quits being his Buddy Monster. A mysterious dragon named Abygale takes the runaway Bal under his wing, but Gao suspects that Abygale`s buddy Gaito has been challenging kids to Buddyfight and taking their cards. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スゲェ! 絶対勝てるバディファイト必勝法!!
Amazing! A Sure-fire Way to Win Buddyfight!
Sugee! Zettai Kateru Buddyfight Hisshouhou!!
episode.summary: Bal is eager to play Buddyfight, but is frustrated when everyone points out that he`s not playing by the rules. Jackknife Dragon offers to teach him a sure-fire way to win without getting complaints. Meanwhile, Tasuku transfers to Aibo Academy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヤベェ! 必殺モンスター誕生!!
Uh-oh! An Impact Monster Is Born!
Yabee! Hissatsu Monster Tanjou!
episode.summary: Gao must protect his new Buddy monster from Kyoya Gaen, who claims this newly-discovered monster could be a threat. Kyoya challenges Gao to a Buddyfight, giving him less than a day to unlock the secrets of the Sun Dragons and the new Impact Monsters. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending
Opening
ヒデェ! 悪魔のコーチ・アスモダイ!!
So Mean! Demon Coach Asmodai!
Hidee! Akuma no Coach Asmodai!!
episode.summary: Bal looks for a coach to help him train hard for the WBC Cup. Tetsuya`s Buddy Demon Lord Asmodai takes Bal under his wing and challenges him physically and mentally, culminating in a Buddyfight with Bal and Gao`s partnership at stake. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: モエモエーッ! 愛と正義の制服戦士ブレザーフリル!!
So Lovely! Uniform Warrior of Love and Courage, Blazer Frill!
Moemoee! Ai to Seigi no Seifuku Senshi Blazer Frill!!
episode.summary: Maska Raid and his Buddy, Blazer Frill, plot to win their match against Tasuku through any means necessary. After a series of mishaps, Blazer Frill convinces Bal to help her win. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キタァー! WBCカップ超東驚大会!!
It`s Here! WBC Cup Cho-Tokyo Championship!
Kitaa! WBC Cup Choutoukyou Taikai!!
episode.summary: The WBC Cup begins, and Gao and his rivals fight to become the Best 8 of Cho-Tokyo. Bal becomes convinced that the only way to win is to increase one`s luck. As Noboru battles Gaito, he`s forced to face some hard truths about destiny and luck. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パネェ! アビゲールVSアジ・ダハーカ!!
Impressive! Abygale Versus Azi Dahaka!
Panee! Abigail VS Azi Dahaka!!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends try to help a mysterious cat find Gaito. Their search leads them to a Buddyfight between Gaito and Kyoya Gaen. Azi Dahaka and Abygale`s past is revealed, as Kyoya goads Gaito into showing him the power of his Impact Monster. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ダメダァ! バルバースト・スマッシャー!?
It`s Not Working! Bal Burst Smasher?!
Damedaa! Bal Burst Smasher!?
episode.summary: Gao struggles to understand Gaito`s attitude towards Buddyfight. In their semi-final match, Gao and Gaito pit their Impact Monsters against each other. Can Gao befriend this fearsome opponent? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: デケェ! 番長大決闘!!
So Huge! Mighty Fighter Showdown!
Dekee! Banchou Daikettou!!
episode.summary: Gao is desperate to see Genma and Dai`s Buddyfight in person and sneaks out to see the match, despite Dr. Buer ordering him to stay in bed. It`s a literal clash of the titans as Genma and Dai compete to determine who is the strongest fighter. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギョギョ! そんなマサカな大ピンチ!!
Yikes! An Unexpected Fishy Disaster!
Gyogyo! Sonna Masaka na Dai Pinch!!
episode.summary: Dash Kazakiri is Gao`s next opponent...and his biggest fan! When Gao comes down with an incurable illness, Dash takes him to a doctor from Magic World. Gao`s sickness gets progressively worse, but he is determined to show Dash the best Buddyfight ever. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナニィ! 奪われた必殺モンスター!!
What? The Stolen Impact Monster!
Nani! Ubawareta Hissatsu Monster!!
episode.summary: As part of a revenge plot against Tasuku, Wataru sends his Buddy to steal Gaito`s Impact Monster card. Bal blames himself and races against the clock to retrieve the card before Wataru and Gaito`s Buddyfight begins. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ショック! 斬夜引退宣言!!
Shock! Zanya`s Retirement Declaration!
Shock! Zanya Intai Sengen!!
episode.summary: Zanya gives his little brother Akatsuki his Buddyfight deck, making him fear that Zanya is retiring to focus on his kendo training...or a mysterious new girlfriend. When Blazer Frill`s latest plot is foiled, she challenges Zanya to a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オリャア! グレイトフル・バルラリアット!!
Pow! Great Full Bal Lariat!
Orya! Great Full Bal Lariat!!
episode.summary: Gao and Dai`s battle continues. Genma reveals the true nature of Bal and Gao`s intensive training, as Gao pits his new Impact Monster against the seemingly invincible Duel Jaeger. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワッショイ! 超東驚大会決勝祭り!!
Hooray! Cho-Tokyo Championship Final Festival!
Wasshoi! Chou Higashi Odoroki Taikai Kesshou Matsuri!!
episode.summary: Gao prepares for the final fight against Dai by reworking his deck, while Bal asks Genma Todoroki for advice on how to beat Dai`s colossal Buddy, Duel Jaeger. Tensions mount as Gao and Dai face off in the final match! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: デタァ! 無敵竜 "リボルテッド"!!
It`s Here! Duel Jaeger
Deta! Muteki Ryuu "Ribol Ted"!!
episode.summary: Tasuku and Dai Kaido face off in the second fight of the semi-finals. The story of how Dai met his Buddy is revealed, and Jack`s Impact Monster meets its match in Duel Jaeger`s evolved form. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: デンジャー! 動き出した狼!!
Danger! The Wolf Makes its Move!
Danger! Ugokidashita Ookami!!
episode.summary: Rouga and Cerberus save Bal from Doctor Gara`s latest attack. Bal gives Cerberus an Impact Monster card as thanks, and Rouga uses it to fight Dai. Gao is eager to face his former upperclassman in a Buddyfight, but Rouga has more than victory on his mind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マタデタァ! 恐怖の天敵ゾディアック!!
Here it Comes Again! Terrifying Natural Enemy, Zodiac!
Matadata! Kyoufu no Tenteki Zodiac!!
episode.summary: Tasuku digs deeper into the mystery of Doctor Gara. Gao and Bal encounter a medical student named Kaeru, who has the same Buddy monster as Gara. Kakeru helps treat Ozon B`s sickness and challenges Gao to a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Kita Kitaaa! WBC Cup Nihon Taikai!!
キタキタァー! WBCカップ日本大会!!
Here it Comes! WBC Cup Japan Tournament!
Kita Kita! WBC Cup Nippon Taikai!!
episode.summary: The Japan Tournament begins. The Buddyfighters compete to be the first to reach 100 wins and qualify for the World Championship. Meanwhile, Tasuku fights to protect Bal and uncover Doctor Gara`s plans. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヨーソロォ! 日本代表選抜の島へ!!
Full Steam Ahead! To The Japan Representative Invitational Island!
Yousorou! Nihon Daihyou Senbatsu no Shima e!!
episode.summary: As the winners of the Cho-Tokyo Championship head to the Japan Tournament, they take a look back at their adventures so far. Their destination holds many secrets, including the mysterious Dragon Force and a new enemy, Doctor Gara. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オババッ! 五剣天下参上!!
Grandmother! Enter Tenka Gotsurugi!
Obaba! Gotsurugi Sanjou!!
episode.summary: Gaito`s quest to find the ultimate dragon power leads him to a mysterious old woman. She agrees to tell him about the Dragon Force, but only if he defeats her grandson, Tenka Gotsurugi. Tenka accidentally challenges Gao instead. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウワッ! 爆発0秒前!!
Yikes! 0 Seconds to Detonation!
Uwa! Bakuhatsu 0 Byou Mae!!
episode.summary: Baku and Kuguru convince Gao that he should focus on winning Buddyfights while they look for the missing Bal. Rouga and Cerberus lend a hand, while Bal fights for his life against Doctor Gara. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バルゥ! 放て, ギャラクティカル・パニッシャー!!
Bal! Fire, Galactical Punisher!
Baruu! Hanate, Galactical Punisher!!
episode.summary: Tasuku rushes to help Gao search for Bal, but is interrupted by the attention-hungry Ageha Gokuraku, whose Divine Guardians deck proves to be a great challenge. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アチィッ! 宿命の灼熱地獄!!
Hot! Searing Executioners of Destiny!
Achii! Shukumei no Shakunetsu Jigoku!!
episode.summary: Tasuku continues to search for Bal, while Gao works on reaching 100 wins. Gaito is challenged by a mysterious fighter with a grudge, and a deadly Searing Executioners deck tailor-made to destroy him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スッゲェ! バルソーサー・オーバーラッシュ!!
Wow! Bal Saucer Over Rush!
Suggee! Bal Saucer Over Rush!!
episode.summary: An anonymous tip leads Tasuku and Gao to Doctor Gara`s lair. Gao and Bal are reunited, but are told that they must withdraw from the tournament unless they can prove that Bal is healthy enough to fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゴーゴー! バル, 怒涛の快進撃!!
Go, Go! Bal`s Surging Steady Advance!
Go Go! Bal, Dotou no Kaishingeki!!
episode.summary: On the final day of the Japan Tournament, the remaining Buddyfighters race to be the first to reach 100 wins. As Gao closes the distance between himself and top fighter Dai Kaido, Doctor Gara puts his plan into motion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガオオォ! これがドラゴンフォースだ!!
Gao! This is the Dragon Force!
Gaoo! Kore ga Dragon Force Da!!
episode.summary: Gao tries to help Bal regain his senses while also battling Doctor Gara. Doctor Gara reveals that he can block Final Phase as well as Impact Monsters. As Gao reminds Bal of their promise to become Buddy Champions, he unlocks a new power within himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キタキタキタァー! WBCカップ世界大会!!
Here it Comes x3! WBC Cup World Championships!
Kita Kita Kitaaa! WBC Cup Sekai Taikai!!
episode.summary: Gao and friends head to Los Angeles for the WBC Cup World Championships! Kyoya makes a surprise appearance as a competitor, as does the mysterious J Genesis. In the first match of the first round, Kyoya unfurls his new flag: the powerful Dragon Zwei. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワナワナ! 逮捕されたジャックナイフ!!
Scary Trap! Jackknife, Arrested!
Wanawana! Taihosareta Jackknife!!
episode.summary: Jack is accused of attacking a WBC Cup competitor. The punishment for his crime: exile. Gao and Bal look for proof of Jack`s innocence while Jack and Tasuku face off against Grim Reaper of Siberia`s traps! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウェディング! 人間山脈デビル・デストロイ!!
Wedding! Man Mountain Range, Devil Destroy!
Wedding! Ningen Sanmyaku Devil Destroy!!
episode.summary: When Gao and Bal`s next opponent mocks them, Bal is determined to bulk up through training. On the day of the match, Devil Destroy Bigmachine falls in love with Noboru and challenges Gao for his hand in marriage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼータ! 驚愕の機甲戦鬼!!
Zetta! Shocking Armored Battle Demon!
Zeta! Kyougaku no Kikou Senki!!
episode.summary: Abygale asks Gao and Tasuku for advice to help Gaito unlock the power of the Dragon Force. Meanwhile, J Genesis plots to crush Gaito in order to sabotage Kyoya`s plans. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ニャニャニャ! にゃにゃにゃにゃ!!
Meow Meow! Meow meow, meow meow!
Nyanyanya! Nyanyanyanya!!
episode.summary: Amigo Takata is forced to concede defeat when his cards go missing. Gao faces a mysterious new opponent and uncovers a previously unknown Buddyfight community. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マジッ!? 人造模倣兵器 ジェムクローン!!
For Real? Fake Replica Weapon, Gemclone!
Maji!? Jinzou Mohou Heiki Gemclone!!
episode.summary: As the Buddy Police work to uncover J Genesis`s secrets, Tasuku sends Jack on a secret mission. The true nature of J Genesis` buddy Gemclone is revealed during the quarterfinals match. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リベンジィ! 虎は二度吠える!!
Revenge! The Tiger Roars Twice!
Revenge! Tora wa Nido Hoeru!!
episode.summary: Noboru must defeat Kyoya in the semifinals if he wants to face Gao in the finals. He looks back at the path that has led him here, and struggles to choose between his pride and the promise he made to Gao. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ラストファイト! さらば, アビゲール!!
Last Fight! Farewell, Abygale!
Last Fight! Saraba, Abygale!!
episode.summary: Gao and Tasuku help Gaito look for his missing buddy, Abygale. Meanwhile, J Genesis and Devil Destroy Bigmachine plot to keep the two apart. Gaito attempts to deal with a traumatic incident from his past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガチヤバ! 必殺のオリジン・ブレイカー!!
Serious Trouble! Impact Origin Breaker!
Gachiyaba! Hissatsu no Origin Breaker!!
episode.summary: As Gao and his friends celebrate Gaito and Abygale`s reunion, J Genesis unveils his Impact Monster`s new form on live TV. Baku suffers a crisis of confidence. Bal makes contact with a mysterious entity who may hold the keys to J Genesis`s plans. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガチスゴ! 超太陽竜バルソレイユ!!
Ultra-Amazing! Super Sun Dragon, Balle Soleil!
Gachisugo! Chou Taiyou Ryuu Balle Soleil!!
episode.summary: Gao and Bal do their best to defeat J Genesis, in hopes of preventing him from selling Origin Breaker to the highest bidder as an instrument of war. Gao, Tasuku, and Gaito`s strong awaken an unknown power within Bal! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オヤジッ! アジ・ダハーカの最期!!
Pops! Azi Dahaka`s End!
Oyajii! Azi Dahaka no Saigo!!
episode.summary: Gaito reveals the truth about Balle Soleil and the Dragon Force. While Gao and his friends search for the missing Bal, Gaito and Abygale have a final showdown with Kyoya and Azi Dahaka. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エンドレス! 黒天太陽竜アジ・ダハーカ"ダ・エーワ"!!
Endless! Black Sky Sun Dragon, Azi Dahaka "Daeva"!
Endless! Kuroten Taiyou Ryuu Azi Dahaka "Da Eva"!!
episode.summary: Azi Dahaka achieves his final evolution form and flies off in search of his nemesis, Balle Soleil. He encounters Chief of the Sea, Dai Kaido, who tries to protect Gao and Bal by challenging Kyoya and Azi Dahaka to a Buddyfight Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ファイナル! WBCカップ世界大会決勝!!
Finally! WBC Cup World Championships Final Match!
Finally! WBC Cup Sekai Taikai Kesshou!!
episode.summary: Gao Mikado and Kyoya Gaen face each other in the final. With a deck of cards expertly prepared by Baku, Gao makes a strong start as Kyoya is pushed into a corner. But then the tables are turned as the ominous specter of Azi Dahaka envelops the stadium. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドヒャァー! 超太陽竜VS黒天太陽竜!!
Whoa! Super Sun Dragon Vs. Black Sky Sun Dragon!
Dohyaa! Chou Taiyou Ryuu vs Kuroten Taiyou Ryuu!!
episode.summary: Gao Mikado and Kyoya Gaen are in the throes of battle! Noboru and the others search for an old card that Baku says Gao needs in his fight against Kyoya. Pushed to the brink, Gao casts Dragonic Force, a big gamble that could bring great harm to himself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マジカッ! 防御力20000の驚異!!
Seriously?! A Threatening 20000 Defense!
Majikaa! Bougyo Ryoku 20000 no Kyoui!!
episode.summary: Kiri returns from Dungeon World, hoping to prevent the creation of Dragon Drei. Before he has a chance to put his plan into action, Gao invites Kiri to a friendly Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゲキトツ! 龍炎寺タスクVS黒渦ガイト!?
Colliding Forces! Tasuku Ryuenji vs. Gaito Kurouzu?!
Gekitotsu! Ryuuenji vs Kurouzu Gaito!?
episode.summary: Gao and Bal are ready to train, but first they have to deal with homework. Gaito and Abygale want to confront Kyoya, but Tasuku and Jack argue that they should leave it to the Buddy Police. A Buddyfight ensues. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リベンジィ! ドクター・ガラの復讐!!
Revenge! Doctor Gara Strikes Back!
Revenge! Doctor Gara no Fukushuu!!
episode.summary: Gao struggles to balance his homework with his preparations for the Buddy Champion Deciding Round. Tasuku faces off against Doctor Gara in the hopes of evolving his Dragon Force. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マジアチィッ! ジェムクローンの心!!
Seriously Hot! Gemclone`s Heart!
Majiachi! Gemclone no Kokoro!
episode.summary: In order to enter Gaen Tower, Gaito must battle J Genesis. J Genesis` Buddy, Origin Breaker, begs Gaito and Abygale to save his father. Gao continues to struggle with his homework. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グッドラック! ウルフ最期のファイト!!
Good luck! Wolf`s Final Fight!
Good Luck! Wolf Saigo no Fight!!
episode.summary: Kyoya orders Wolf to challenge Gao to a Buddyfight. Gao tries to uncover the truth behind why Rouga Aragami abandoned his name and went back to doing Kyoya`s bidding. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガチショック! ドラゴン・ドライ驚異の力!!
Massive Shock! Dragon Drei`s Amazing Power!
Gachi Shock! Dragon Drei Kyoui no Chikara!!
episode.summary: The world looks on as Paruko delivers a live broadcast of a historic battle. Kyoya challenges Tasuku and Gaito to a two-on-one Buddyfight, with the newly-completed Dragon Drei card as the stakes. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シークレット! プロジェクトDDDの全貌!!
Secret! The True Nature of Project Triple D!
Secret! Project DDD no Zenbou!!
episode.summary: Gao trains hard with Tasuku and Gaito in preparation for the Buddy Champion Deciding Round, while Baku, Kuguru and Noboru work on strategy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ファイッ! バディチャンピオン決定戦!!
Fight! Buddy Champion Deciding Round!
Figh! Buddy Champion Ketteisen!!
episode.summary: Gao and Bal head to Los Angeles to face Kyoya Gaen in the deciding round of the WBC Cup. Kyoya reveals his secret agenda to change the world using his new Dragon Drei card. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クライマックス! 放て, エターナル・バルブラスター!!
Climax! Eternal Bal Blaster!
Climax! Hanate, Eternal Bal Blaster!!
episode.summary: Dragons all over the world begin to suffer as Kyoya puts his plan into motion. Gao`s friends attempt to control the chaos, while Gao and Bal face off against Kyoya in a final battle for the future. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バイバイ! バル, 永遠の別れ!!
Bye-bye! Eternal Farewell to Bal!
Byebye! Bal, Eien no Wakare!!
episode.summary: As Tasuku and Gao explore the history of Bal`s battles with Azi Dahaka, Bal has visions of the future. Gao`s friends organize a victory celebration that quickly becomes a Buddyfight tournament. Source: crunchyroll
